    • clickSaveProduct

      public void clickSaveProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Saves product being added when clicking the save button on the addProductForm screen. On clickSaveProduct I was getting a RUNTIME ERROR java.lang.error nullPointerException error. I had to wrap the whole body of the code inside the "try" and "catch" blocks for my code to work.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
